inclusion.criterion: Female diagnosed fibromyalgia according to American College of Rheumatology 1990 criteria
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: trauma in neck-shoulder or thoracic region with prolonged symptoms during the last three month before examination
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe illness (neurological e.g Parkinson disease, neuromuscular e.g Multiple sclerosis, respiratory e.g chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, muscle/skeletal disease e.g ankylosing spondylitis)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to understand or follow instructions
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to participate at measurement sessions
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman with abdominal pain and leukocytosis. Computed Tomography shows a distended appendix without perforation.
